titleStmt.title: Two new sermons preached in Oxford, fitted for these times the one of diuine mysteries, the other of church-schismes, but the vnity of orthodox professors / by J.D.
titleStmt.author: Doughty, John, 1598-1672.

notesStmt.note: Also published under title: A discourse concerning the abstrusivenesse of divine mysteries.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
